original_text: This image's head was of fine gold, his breast and his arms of silver, his belly and his thighs of brass,
korean_text: 그 우상의 머리는 순금이요 가슴과 두 팔은 은이요 배와 넓적다리는 놋이요

sentences.original_text: This image's head was of fine gold
his breast and his arms of silver
his belly and his thighs of brass
